root.title: taiwan first quarter maiz import see rise
root.body: taiwan maiz import commit expect rise 970,000 tonn first four month 1987 870,000 tonn year earlier spokesman joint committe maiz import told reuter say 75 pct import come u. rest south africa maiz import target calendar 1987 set well 3.4 mln tonn compar actual 3.07 mln 1985 ad
